Activity.description: Activity that is covered by the funds, for example, a trade show or seminar.

AllocationId.description: ID of the partner fund allocation.

BudgetId.description: ID of the partner marketing budget.

ChannelPartnerId.description: ID of the channel partner. Note The ChannelPartnerId field isn’t supported for formula fields, custom buttons, or custom links for the PartnerFundRequest object. This limitation also applies to the PartnerFundAllocation and PartnerMarketingBudget objects.

DesiredOutcome.description: Desired outcome if requested funds are used.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last interacted with this record, directly or indirectly. Some sample scenarios are:

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the fund request.

Status.description: Status of the fund request. Values are: Draft Approved Rejected

TotalApprovedFcs.description: Total amount of approved fund claims.

TotalReimbursedFcs.description: Total amount of reimbursed fund claims.
